article: turkey has taken tight security measures to protect its jewish minority as well as israel 's diplomatic missions in response to increased tensions following israel 's raid on a turkish-flagged aid ship , turkish interior minister besir atalay said wednesday .
abstract: turkey boosts security for jewish residents amid protests
